examples: Cololejeunea cingens (Herz.) Bernecker & Pócs in Polish Bot. J. 54: 4. 2009
source: Email from Anders Hagborg, Oct 2013: "She used Andrea Lücking in publications from 1995 to 1995 and possibly 1997. She used Andrea Bernecker-Lücking from 1998 to 2000. She has used Andrea Bernecker from 2009 until now"
